Package er.corebl.mail

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ERCMailer.MailerCallback
    A MailerCallback allows for pre/post processing.
    ERCMailer.MailerDelegate
    A MailerDelegate allows for message suppression and modification that is beyond the scope of the mailer daemon.
    MailAction.UnsubscribeDelegate  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CSAMailerDelegate
    The default delegate is designed to support compliance with the CAN SPAM Act.
    ERCMailer.MessageSender
    The Message sender class sends messages on a background thread.
    MailAction  
    MailAction.DefaultUnsubscribeDelegate  
    SingleSenderDelegate
    A basic sender delegate class that only suppresses email based on the mail address stop reason.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ERCMailAddressVerification  
    ERCMailer
    The ERCMailer is a singleton to send mail messages at a specified send rate.
    ERCMailRecipientType  
    ERCMailState  
    ERCMailStopReason
